level.heading: MOTOR FUEL SOLD TO THE UNITED STATES GOVERNMENT OR GOVERNMENTS AND AGENCIES OFOREIGN COUNTRIES (ยง 9-907)

level.text: The provisions of ยง 807 of Chapter 8 of this title shall apply to sales of motor fuel under this chapter.
